spec_data.Name: fpaste
spec_data.Description:
It is often useful to be able to easily paste text to the Fedora
Pastebin at http://paste.fedoraproject.org and this simple script
will do that and return the resulting URL so that people may
examine the output. This can hopefully help folks who are for
some reason stuck without X, working remotely, or any other
reason they may be unable to paste something into the pastebin
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 08 Sep 2017 05:52:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple tool for pasting info onto sticky notes instances
